SLM appointed to manage East Staffordshire’s leisure services

East Staffordshire Borough Council has awarded a 10-year contract to Sports and Leisure Management Ltd (SLM) for the management of its leisure facilities and services.

Read more about the arrangements

ESBC Equalities Survey

East Staffordshire Borough Council is committed to creating a fairer East Staffordshire for everyone. Please take two minutes to complete our equalities survey.
Complete the survey online

General Data Protection Regulation

Following the launch of the General Data Protection Regulation across the EU, East Staffordshire Borough Council has published its Privacy Notice.
Read our Privacy Notice
